events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role on our platform successfully.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords found in the candidate's resume and cover letter.
A recruiter specialized in software development roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's experience with modern engineering practices.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to evaluate the candidate's coding and problem-solving skills.
